Package controller

Class CustomerController

Object
CustomerController
public class CustomerController extends Object
Author:
Daniel Controller class providing methods related to customer actions, including making bookings, listing all movies, ranking top movies and checking seat availability for movie showtimes.

    checkSeatGap(ArrayList<Integer> cols)
    Called to check if there is a gap of at most 1 seat in the selected seats Returns true if seat gap is ok, false if seat needs to be reselected
